tag.name: html
tag.help: Represents the root of an HTML document

parameter.name: manifest
parameter.help: Specifies URL of the document's cache manifest for offline browsing

tag.name: body
tag.help: Contains body elements of the document

tag.name: a
tag.help: Anchor tag to declare hyperlink

parameter.name: href
parameter.help: URL of the page to hyperlink to

parameter.name: hreflang
parameter.help: Language of the document that is hyper-linked

parameter.name: media
parameter.help: Media for which the document is optimized for

parameter.name: rel
parameter.help: Relationship between current document and the hyper-linked document

parameter.name: target
parameter.help: Where to open the huyper-linked document

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Mime-type of the document

tag.name: abbr
tag.help: Tag to indicate abbrivation or acronym, e.g. WWW

parameter.name: title
parameter.help: Title of the abbrivation e.g. World Wide Web for acronym WWW

tag.name: address
tag.help: Address or contact information of the owner or author of the document

tag.name: area
tag.help: Defined a clickable area in an image map

parameter.name: alt
parameter.help: Alternate text for the clickable area. This attribute is required if href is specified

parameter.name: coords
parameter.help: Co-ordinates of this clickable area. Specified as x,y,width,height in a string.

parameter.name: href
parameter.help: Hyperlink URL of the clickable area

parameter.name: hreflang
parameter.help: Language of the target URL

parameter.name: media
parameter.help: Media for which the document of the target URL is optimized for

parameter.name: rel
parameter.help: Relationship between current document and the hyper-linked URL

parameter.name: target
parameter.help: Where to open the huyper-linked document

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Mime-type of the document

tag.name: article
tag.help: Indicates and articel or content that is independent of the document

tag.name: aside
tag.help: Defines content that is aside from the content in which it is placed. The content in aside is still related to surrounding content.

tag.name: audio
tag.help: Specifies audio content in the document

parameter.name: autoplay
parameter.help: Indicates that the audio content will play as soon as it is loaded

parameter.name: controls
parameter.help: Indicates that audio controls like play, stop etc. to be displayed

parameter.name: loop
parameter.help: Indicates that audio to be played in a loop

parameter.name: muted
parameter.help: Indicates that audio is to be muted

parameter.name: preload
parameter.help: Indicates how audio should be preloaded

parameter.name: src
parameter.help: URL of the audio file

tag.name: b
tag.help: Specifies text in bold

tag.name: base
tag.help: Specifies base URL for all relative URLs inthe document

parameter.name: href
parameter.help: Hyperlink URL of the clickable area

parameter.name: target
parameter.help: Where to open the huyper-linked document

tag.name: bdi
tag.help: Specifies bi-directional text support. Can be used to specify text direction that is different from surounding text direction.

tag.name: bdo
tag.help: Overrides current text direction within this tag

parameter.name: dir
parameter.help: Direction of the text

tag.name: br
tag.help: Specifies single line break

tag.name: button
tag.help: Creates a button control

parameter.name: autofocus
parameter.help: Specifies that button should get the focus when page is loaded

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.help: Disables the button

parameter.name: form
parameter.help: Specifies form ids that this button belongs to. Button can be outside forms. Ids are space seperated.

parameter.name: formaction
parameter.help: Specifies URL to which the form data to be submitted. Button must be of the type Submit.

parameter.name: formenctype
parameter.help: Specifies data encoding type of the form data before submitting it. Button must be of the type Submit.

parameter.name: formmethod
parameter.help: Specifies how to submit form data. Button must be of the type Submit.

parameter.name: formnovalidate
parameter.help: Specifies that form data should not be validated before submiting. Button must be of the type Submit.

parameter.name: formtarget
parameter.help: Specifies where to display the response after submiting the form. Button must be of the type Submit.

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Specifies name of the button

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Specifies type of the button

parameter.name: value
parameter.help: Specifies value of the button

tag.name: canvas
tag.help: Canvas tag for prerforming drawing operations

parameter.name: height
parameter.help: Specifies height of the canvas in pixels

parameter.name: width
parameter.help: Specifies width of the canvas in pixels

tag.name: caption
tag.help: Specifies caption of the table. Must follow table start tag

tag.name: cite
tag.help: Specifies citation

parameter.name: title
parameter.help: Title of the citation

tag.name: code
tag.help: Contains code

tag.name: col
tag.help: Specifies column properties of within a colgroup

parameter.name: span
parameter.help: Number of columns to span

tag.name: colgroup
tag.help: Specifies a group of columns in a table. Used for formatting

parameter.name: span
parameter.help: Number of columns to span

tag.name: command
tag.help: Specifies a command that user can invoke

parameter.name: checked
parameter.help: Specifies that command should be checked when page is loaded. Valid when command type is radio or checkbox

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.help: Specifies that the command should be disabled

parameter.name: icon
parameter.help: Specifies image URL for the command icon

parameter.name: label
parameter.help: Specifies label of the command

parameter.name: radiogroup
parameter.help: Specifies name of the radio group (of commands) that is toggled when this group is toggled.

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Specifies type of the command

tag.name: datalist
tag.help: Specifies predefined options for an input field. Use option tag to specify options

tag.name: del
tag.help: Indicates that specified text is deleted

parameter.name: cite
parameter.help: Specifies URL of the document that explains reason for deletion

parameter.name: datetime
parameter.help: Specifies date and time when text was deleted. Should be in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD format

tag.name: details
tag.help: Creates an interactive widget, that can be opened or closed to reveal detail content

parameter.name: open
parameter.help: Specifies detail content should be visible

tag.name: dfn
tag.help: Indicates definition

tag.name: dialog
tag.help: Defines a Dialog box

parameter.name: open
parameter.help: Specifies that the dialog box should be visible

tag.name: div
tag.help: Defines a division in the document

tag.name: dl
tag.help: Specifies definition list. Tag dt and dd are used to specify term and description

tag.name: dl
tag.help: Specifies term in the definition list. Used inside dl tag

tag.name: em
tag.help: Specifies emphasized text

tag.name: embed
tag.help: Specifies a plugin for non-HTML content

parameter.name: height
parameter.help: Height in pixels

parameter.name: src
parameter.help: URL of the content to be embedded

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Mime-type of the embedded content

parameter.name: width
parameter.help: Width in pixels

tag.name: fieldset
tag.help: Groups related elements in a form

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.help: Specifies if the group is disabled

parameter.name: form
parameter.help: Specifies Ids of forms that this fieldset belongs to

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Name of the fieldset

tag.name: figcaption
tag.help: Specifies caption for the figure tag

tag.name: figure
tag.help: Embeds content like image, illustration etc. Use figcaption tag to specify caption for the figure

tag.name: footer
tag.help: Contains footer of the document or a section

tag.name: form
tag.help: Creates HTML form

parameter.name: accept-charset
parameter.help: Specifies character encoding to be used when submitting the form

parameter.name: action
parameter.help: Specifies URL where form data is to be submitted

parameter.name: autocomplete
parameter.help: Specifies if auto complete to be enabled for input fields

parameter.name: enctype
parameter.help: Specifies method of encoding form data before submitting. Valid for 'post' method only

parameter.name: method
parameter.help: Specifies method for posting form data

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Specifies name of the form

parameter.name: novalidate
parameter.help: Specifies that form should not be validated before submitting

parameter.name: target
parameter.help: Specifies where to open response after submitting the form

tag.name: h1
tag.help: Header tag 1

tag.name: h2
tag.help: Header tag 2

tag.name: h3
tag.help: Header tag 3

tag.name: h4
tag.help: Header tag 4

tag.name: h5
tag.help: Header tag 5

tag.name: h6
tag.help: Header tag 6

tag.name: head
tag.help: Specifies head section of the document. Can contain tags like title, meta, script and style

tag.name: header
tag.help: Specifies header for the document or a section

tag.name: hgroup
tag.help: Groups header elements like h1 to h6

tag.name: hr
tag.help: Specifies a horizontal rule in the document

tag.name: i
tag.help: Specifies text in an alternate voice or mood

tag.name: iframe
tag.help: Creates and inline frame to embed another document

parameter.name: sandbox
parameter.help: Specifies restrictions for the content in the iframe

parameter.name: seamless
parameter.help: Specifies that the content of the iframe should look like a part of the containing document

parameter.name: src
parameter.help: URL to load in the iframe

parameter.name: srcdoc
parameter.help: Specifies HTML content for the iframe

parameter.name: height
parameter.help: Height in pixels

parameter.name: width
parameter.help: Width in pixels

tag.name: img
tag.help: Image tag. Specifies an image in the document

parameter.name: alt
parameter.help: Specifies alternate text for the image

parameter.name: crossorigin
parameter.help: Specifies that images from another site that allows cross-origin access can be used with Canvas

parameter.name: height
parameter.help: Height of the image in pixels

parameter.name: ismap
parameter.help: Specifies that image is a server-side image-map

parameter.name: src
parameter.help: URL of the image

parameter.name: usemap
parameter.help: Specifies that image is a client-side image-map

parameter.name: width
parameter.help: Width of the image in pixels

tag.name: input
tag.help: Specifies an input field

parameter.name: accept
parameter.help: Specifies type of the files that server can accept

parameter.name: alt
parameter.help: Specifies alternate text for image type field

parameter.name: autocomplete
parameter.help: Specifies if autocompletion is enabled for this field

parameter.name: autofocus
parameter.help: Specifies if the input field should get focus when the page is loaded

parameter.name: checked
parameter.help: Specifies if the check-box or radio button be selected on page load

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.help: Specifies if the input field be disabled on page load

parameter.name: form
parameter.help: Specifies Ids of forms that this field belongs to

parameter.name: formaction
parameter.help: URL that will process data in the input field when form is submitted. Valid for type 'submit' and 'image'

parameter.name: formenctype
parameter.help: Specifies type of the files that server can accept

parameter.name: formmethod
parameter.help: Specifies method to be used to post form data

parameter.name: formnovalidate
parameter.help: Specifies the input field should not be validated before posting form data

parameter.name: formtarget
parameter.help: Specifies where to display reponse data. Valid when type of 'submit' or 'image'

parameter.name: height
parameter.help: Height in pixels. Valid for type 'image'

parameter.name: list
parameter.help: Id of the datalist element that contains options for this input element

parameter.name: max
parameter.help: Specifies maximun value for the input field

parameter.name: maxlength
parameter.help: Specifies maximun number of characters allowed in the input field

parameter.name: min
parameter.help: Specifies minimum value for the input field

parameter.name: multiple
parameter.help: Specifies that more than one values can be entered in the input field

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Name of the input field

parameter.name: pattern
parameter.help: Specifies regular expression to validate the field value

parameter.name: placeholder
parameter.help: Specifies hint about expected value in the input field

parameter.name: readonly
parameter.help: Specifies that the input field is read-only

parameter.name: required
parameter.help: Specifies that the input field is required

parameter.name: size
parameter.help: Specifies number of characters allowed in the input field

parameter.name: src
parameter.help: Valid for type 'image'. Specifies URL of the image to be used for submit button

parameter.name: step
parameter.help: Specifies step interval for the input field value

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Specifies type of input field

parameter.name: value
parameter.help: Specifies value of the text field

parameter.name: width
parameter.help: Width of the input field in pixels

tag.name: ins
tag.help: Specifies inserted text in the document. Usually accompanied with del tag

parameter.name: cite
parameter.help: Specifies URL of the document that explains reason for insertion of the text

parameter.name: datetime
parameter.help: Specifies date and time when text was inserted. Should be in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD format

tag.name: kbd
tag.help: Indicates input text to be entered by users

tag.name: keygen
tag.help: Used for generating key pair when form is submitted. Private key is saved in the local keystore and public key is sent to the server

parameter.name: autofocus
parameter.help: Specifies that the field should get focus when page is loaded

parameter.name: challenge
parameter.help: Specifies that value of the keygen field should be challenged when submitted

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.help: Specifies tha the field should be disabled when page is loaded

parameter.name: form
parameter.help: Specifies space separated form ids to which this field belongs

parameter.name: keytype
parameter.help: Specifies security algorithm of the key

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Specifies name of the field

tag.name: label
tag.help: Specifies label for an input field

parameter.name: for
parameter.help: Id of an input element for which this label is specified

parameter.name: form
parameter.help: Space separated list of form ids to which this label belongs

tag.name: legend
tag.help: Specifies caption for a fieldset element

tag.name: li
tag.help: Specifies list item in an ordered (ol) or unordered (ul) list

parameter.name: value
parameter.help: Specifies starting value for a numbered list

tag.name: link
tag.help: Specifies link to an external style sheet

parameter.name: href
parameter.help: URL of an external style sheet to be linked in this document

parameter.name: hreflang
parameter.help: Language of the linked document

parameter.name: media
parameter.help: Media for which the linked document is optimized for

parameter.name: rel
parameter.help: Relationship between current document and the linked document

parameter.name: sizes
parameter.help: Specifies size of the linked resource. Valid for rel=icon.

parameter.name: target
parameter.help: Where to open the linked document

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Mime-type of the linked document

tag.name: map
tag.help: Specifies image map

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Specifies name of the image map

tag.name: meta
tag.help: Specifies metadata about the document

parameter.name: charset
parameter.help: Specifies character encoding of the document

parameter.name: content
parameter.help: Specifies value associated with http-equiv or name attribute

parameter.name: http-equiv
parameter.help: Used for specifying http reponse header. Specify value in the 'content' attribute

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Specifies name of the metadata

tag.name: meter
tag.help: Indicates value within a range

parameter.name: value
parameter.help: Specifies current value

parameter.name: min
parameter.help: Specifies minimum value. Default is zero

parameter.name: low
parameter.help: Specifies value that is considered low in the given range

parameter.name: high
parameter.help: Specifies value that is considered high in the given range

parameter.name: max
parameter.help: Specifies maximum value. Default is 1

parameter.name: optimum
parameter.help: Specifies optimum value

tag.name: nav
tag.help: Specifies a set of navigation links

tag.name: noscript
tag.help: Specifies alternate text when script is disabled

tag.name: object
tag.help: Embeds external object in the document

parameter.name: data
parameter.help: Specifies URL of the Object

parameter.name: form
parameter.help: Space seperated list of form Ids this element belongs to

parameter.name: height
parameter.help: Height in pixels

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Specifies name of this element

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Mime-type of the data represented by the Object

parameter.name: usemap
parameter.help: Name of the client-side image map

parameter.name: width
parameter.help: Width in pixels

tag.name: ol
tag.help: Specifies ordered list

parameter.name: reversed
parameter.help: Specifies that the list is in reverse order

parameter.name: start
parameter.help: Specifies starting number for the list

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Specifies type of the list

tag.name: optgroup
tag.help: Groups related options in a drop down list

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.help: Specifies that group should be disabled

parameter.name: label
parameter.help: Specifies name of this element

tag.name: option
tag.help: Specifies option for a select list

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.help: Specifies that the element should be disabled

parameter.name: label
parameter.help: Specifies name of this element

parameter.name: selected
parameter.help: Specifies that the option should be selected

parameter.name: value
parameter.help: Specifies value of this element

tag.name: output
tag.help: Represents result of a calculation

parameter.name: form
parameter.help: Space seperated list of form Ids this element belongs to

parameter.name: for
parameter.help: Id of the element for which this calculation belongs

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Specifies name of this element

tag.name: p
tag.help: Defines a paragraph

tag.name: param
tag.help: Specifies parameter for Object tag

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Specifies name of this element

parameter.name: value
parameter.help: Value of the element

tag.name: pre
tag.help: Specifies preformatted text

tag.name: progress
tag.help: Represents progress of a task

parameter.name: max
parameter.help: Represents total amount of task

parameter.name: value
parameter.help: Represents amount of task completed

tag.name: q
tag.help: Specifies a quotation

parameter.name: cite
parameter.help: URL of source of quotation

tag.name: script
tag.help: Defines client side Javascript

parameter.name: async
parameter.help: Specifies that the script should be executed asynchronously. Valid only for external scripts

parameter.name: charset
parameter.help: Specifies charset encoding to be used for external script files

parameter.name: defer
parameter.help: Specifies that the script should be executed after parsing the page. Valid for external script files

parameter.name: src
parameter.help: URL of the script file

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Specifies mime-type of the script

tag.name: section
tag.help: Specifies section in the document

tag.name: select
tag.help: Creates a drop-down list

parameter.name: autofocus
parameter.help: Specifies if the element should get focus when the page is loaded

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.help: Specifies if the element should be disabled

parameter.name: multiple
parameter.help: Specifies if multiple options can be selected

parameter.name: required
parameter.help: Specifies if user must selected a value

parameter.name: form
parameter.help: Space separated form Idsto which this element belongs

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Specifies name of the element

parameter.name: size
parameter.help: Specifies number of visible options in the drop-down list

tag.name: small
tag.help: Specifies smaller text

tag.name: source
tag.help: Specifies source for audio and video tags

parameter.name: src
parameter.help: URL of the source

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Specifies mime-type of the script

parameter.name: media
parameter.help: Specifies the type of media. Value must be a media-query

tag.name: span
tag.help: Used for grouping and applying styles to inline elements

tag.name: strong
tag.help: Defines important text

tag.name: style
tag.help: Used for defininf style of the document

parameter.name: media
parameter.help: Specifies the type of media. Value must be a media-query

parameter.name: scoped
parameter.help: Indicated that style applies to parent element and its children

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Specifies mime-type of the style-sheet

tag.name: sub
tag.help: Defines superscripted text

tag.name: summary
tag.help: Used in conjuction with details tag

tag.name: sup
tag.help: Defines superscripted text

tag.name: table
tag.help: Defines an HTML table

parameter.name: border
parameter.help: Specifies if table should have borders

parameter.name: align
parameter.help: Specifies alignment of a table in the page

tag.name: tbody
tag.help: Specifies body of the table. It groups table rows

tag.name: td
tag.help: Defines a cell of the table

parameter.name: colspan
parameter.help: Specifies number of columns that this cell should span

parameter.name: headers
parameter.help: Specifies a space-separated Ids of header cells that contain information about this cell

parameter.name: rowspan
parameter.help: Specifies number of rows that this cell should span

tag.name: textarea
tag.help: Creates a multi-line text input field

parameter.name: autofocus
parameter.help: Specifies if the element should get focus when the page is loaded

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.help: Specifies if the element should be disabled

parameter.name: form
parameter.help: Space separated form Idsto which this element belongs

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Specifies name of the element

parameter.name: required
parameter.help: Specifies if user must selected a value

parameter.name: readonly
parameter.help: Specifies if this element should be read-only

parameter.name: cols
parameter.help: Specifies number of visible characters

parameter.name: rows
parameter.help: Specifies number of visible lines

parameter.name: maxlength
parameter.help: Specifies maximum number of characters allowed in this field

parameter.name: placeholder
parameter.help: Specifies hint the expected value

parameter.name: wrap
parameter.help: Specifies how the text in a text area is to be wrapped

tag.name: tfoot
tag.help: Specifies footer of the table

tag.name: th
tag.help: Defines a header cell in an HTML table

parameter.name: colspan
parameter.help: Specifies number of columns that this cell should span

parameter.name: headers
parameter.help: Specifies Ids of header cells that contain information about this cell

parameter.name: rowspan
parameter.help: Specifies the number of rows this cell spans

parameter.name: scope
parameter.help: Specifies if this header cell is a header for a column, row, or group of columns or rows

tag.name: thead
tag.help: Groups table header elements

tag.name: time
tag.help: Defines a time and a date

parameter.name: datetime
parameter.help: A valid date-time string

tag.name: title
tag.help: Specifies title of the document

tag.name: tr
tag.help: Defines row in a HTML table

tag.name: u
tag.help: Underlines the content

tag.name: ul
tag.help: Creates an unordered list

tag.name: var
tag.help: Formats the text as variable

tag.name: video
tag.help: Defines a video

parameter.name: src
parameter.help: Specifies URL of the video file

parameter.name: crossorigin
parameter.help: Specifies how to configure Cross-Origin Resource Sharing

parameter.name: poster
parameter.help: Specifies URL of the image file to be used as a poster for this video

parameter.name: preload
parameter.help: Specifies if and how video should be preloaded

parameter.name: autoplay
parameter.help: Specifies if video should start playing after the page is loaded

parameter.name: mediagroup
parameter.help: Specifies media elements to link together

parameter.name: loop
parameter.help: Specifies if video should play in a loop

parameter.name: muted
parameter.help: Specifies if video should be muted

parameter.name: controls
parameter.help: Specifies if video controls to be displayed

parameter.name: width
parameter.help: Specifies width in pixels

parameter.name: height
parameter.help: Specifies height in pixels

tag.name: wbr
tag.help: Specifies where line break can be added in a text. Stands for Word Break Opportunity

parameter.name: accesskey
parameter.help: Specifies shortcut key to access the element

parameter.name: class
parameter.help: Space separated CSS style classes

parameter.name: contenteditable
parameter.help: Specifies if the content is editable

parameter.name: contextmenu
parameter.help: Specifies ID of the context menu item in the DOM

parameter.name: dir
parameter.help: Specifies direction of the text

parameter.name: draggable
parameter.help: Specifies if the element is draggable

parameter.name: dropzone
parameter.help: Specifies action after an element is dropped on this element

parameter.name: hidden
parameter.help: Hides the element

parameter.name: id
parameter.help: Specifies ID of the element

parameter.name: inert
parameter.help: Specifies that element to be made inert. Even if element is visible in the document, browser ignores it for actions like find.

parameter.name: lang
parameter.help: Specifies language of the content in the element

parameter.name: spellcheck
parameter.help: Specifies if spellcheck to be done on the content in the element.

parameter.name: style
parameter.help: Specifies inline CSS style

parameter.name: tabindex
parameter.help: Specifies tabbing order of the element

parameter.name: title
parameter.help: Specifies title of the element. Some browsers display this information when cursor is hovered over the element.

parameter.name: translate
parameter.help: Specifies if the content of the element to be translated when the page is localized.

parameter.name: onafterprint
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run after the document is printed

parameter.name: onbeforeprint
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run before the document is printed

parameter.name: onbeforeunload
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run before the document is uploaded

parameter.name: onerror
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when error occurs in the document

parameter.name: onhaschange
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the document is changed

parameter.name: onload
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the document is loaded

parameter.name: onmessage
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the message is triggered

parameter.name: onoffline
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the document goes offline

parameter.name: ononline
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the document comes online again

parameter.name: onpagehide
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the window is hidden

parameter.name: onpageshow
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the window is displayed

parameter.name: onpageshow
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the window is displayed

parameter.name: onpopstate
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the window history is changed

parameter.name: onredo
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the redo action is performed

parameter.name: onresize
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the window is resized

parameter.name: onstorage
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when browser storage is updated

parameter.name: onundo
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when undo action is performed

parameter.name: onunload
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the page is unloaded

parameter.name: onblur
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the element loses focus

parameter.name: onchange
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the value of the element is changed

parameter.name: oncontextmenu
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the context menu is invoked

parameter.name: onfocus
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the element gets focus

parameter.name: onformchange
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when a form changes

parameter.name: onforminput
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when a form gets user input

parameter.name: oninput
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the element gets user input

parameter.name: oninvalid
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the element value is invalid

parameter.name: onselect
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the text in an element is selected

parameter.name: onsubmit
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when a form is submitted

parameter.name: onkeydown
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run a key is down

parameter.name: onkeypress
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run a key is pressed

parameter.name: onkeyup
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run a key is up

parameter.name: onclick
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run mouse is clicked on the element

parameter.name: ondblclick
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run mouse is clicked on the element

parameter.name: ondrag
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the element is dragged

parameter.name: ondragend
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run at the end of drag operation

parameter.name: ondragenter
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the element is dragged to a valid drop location

parameter.name: ondragleave
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the element leaves a valid drop location

parameter.name: ondragover
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the element is being dragged over a valid drop location

parameter.name: ondragstart
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run at the start of drag operation on the element

parameter.name: ondrop
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the dragged element is being dropped

parameter.name: onmousedown
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when a moouse button is pressed on the element

parameter.name: onmousemove
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the mouse pointer is moved over the element

parameter.name: onmouseover
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the mouse pointer moves over the element

parameter.name: onmouseup
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when a mouse button is released on the element

parameter.name: onmousewheel
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when the mouse wheel is being turned

parameter.name: onscroll
parameter.help: Specifies script to be run when content of the element is being scrolled
